TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEditable

summary.span: 为开发人员提供接口，以指定与 控件相关联的自定义编辑控件。

span.span: Provides an interface for developers to specify custom editing controls that are associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口使您能够将自定义 控件与服务器控件（例如 控件、用户控件或自定义服务器控件）相关联。The interface enables you to associate custom controls with a server control--such as a control, a user control, or a custom server control. 控件 包含在 控件中，此区域及其编辑控件向最终用户提供了一个用户界面 (UI) 用于修改关联控件上的属性、外观和行为 。The controls are contained with an control, and this zone with its editing controls provides end users with a user interface (UI) for modifying properties, appearance, and behavior on the associated control. 接口包括两个公开的成员。The interface includes two exposed members. 属性提供了一种方法，用于 控件获取对关联的服务器控件的引用。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the associated server control. 方法用于创建每个 与服务器控件关联的自定义控件的实例，并将其作为集合返回。The method is used to create an instance of each custom control associated with a server control, and return them as a collection. 已在基类上实现接口 ，但默认情况下，此实现不会将任何自定义 控件与 类关联。The interface is already implemented on the base class, although by default this implementation does not associate any custom controls with the class. 若要将派生 控件与自定义 控件关联，可以重写 方法。To associate a derived control with custom controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在自定义控件中重写接口的方法 ，该控件在 控件进入编辑模式时创建自定义控件的实例。The following code example demonstrates how to override the methods of the interface in a custom control, which then creates an instance of a custom control when the control enters edit mode. 此示例包含四个部分：This example has four parts: - 自定义类的代码。The code for the custom class. - 承载自定义控件的网页。The Web page that hosts the custom control. - 将页面切换到编辑模式的用户控件。A user control that switches the page into edit mode. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是自定义 `TextDisplayWebPart` 类。The first part of the code example is the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` class. 请注意，类派生自 类，并实现 接口，并为 方法和属性提供特定实现 。Notice that the class derives from the class and implements the interface, providing specific implementations for the method and the property. 另请注意，嵌套在 `TextDisplayWebPart` 类中的是从基类派生的私有自定义 `TextDisplayEditorPart` 类 。Notice also that nested within the `TextDisplayWebPart` class is a private, custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` class that derives from the base class. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是承载自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the custom control. 请注意，虽然 控件在页的标记中声明，但不需要在该控件中引用该自定义 控件，因为它可以在运行时以编程方式添加。Notice that although an control is declared in the markup of the page, the custom control need not be referenced there, because it can be added programmatically at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#7)] 此代码示例的第三部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够将页面切换到编辑模式。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables a user to switch the page into edit mode. 请注意，在宿主网页中引用了用户控件。Notice that the user control is referenced in the hosting Web page. 有关如何创建此用户控件的完整说明，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For a full description of how to create this user control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/displaymodeuccs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/displaymodeucvb.ascx#8)] 若要运行此代码示例，请在浏览器中加载宿主网页，向文本框添加一些文本，然后单击 " **设置标签内容** " 按钮以更新控件中的标签。To run the code example, load the hosting Web page in a browser, add some text to the text box, and click the **Set Label Content** button to update the label in the control. 若要将页面切换到编辑模式，请从包含显示模式的下拉列表中选择 " **编辑** "。To switch the page into edit mode, select **Edit** from the drop-down list containing the display modes. 若要从自定义控件显示 UI `TextDisplayEditorPart` ，请单击控件上的谓词菜单下拉箭头 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后选择 " **编辑**"。To display the UI from the custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` control, click the verbs menu drop-down arrow on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and select **Edit**. 在编辑 UI 中，可以使用包含字体样式的下拉列表来更新控件中标签的文本样式 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。In the editing UI, you can use the drop-down list containing the font styles to update the text style for the label in the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 您必须在 "显示模式" 下拉列表中单击 " **浏览" 模式** 将页面返回到普通视图，并确认标签中的文本现在具有您在编辑模式下选择的字体样式。You must click **Browse Mode** in the display modes drop-down list to return the page to normal view and confirm that the text in the label now has the font style you selected while in edit mode.

para.span: 如果要使用不是 Web 部件应用程序中的控件的服务器控件 (即，如果将这些控件添加到 区域) ，并且想要将自定义 控件与此类服务器控件相关联，则需要实现 接口。

span.span: If you want to use server controls that are not controls in a Web Parts application (that is, if you add these controls to a zone), and if you want to associate custom controls with such server controls, you need to implement the interface.

para.span: 派生 控件不应实现接口，因为基类 已执行此操作。

span.span: Derived controls should not implement the interface, because the base class already does so.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 返回实现 接口的服务器控件的关联自定义 控件的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls associated with a server control that implements the interface.

returns.span: ，包含服务器控件的关联自定义 控件的集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以创建 与自定义控件、控件或用户控件关联的所有自定义控件的集合 ，并将它们作为 对象返回。The method enables you to create a collection of all the custom controls associated with your custom control, control, or user control, and return them as an object. 每当服务器控件进入编辑模式时，控件都将获取集合并创建所有控件的实例。The control takes the collection and creates instances of all the controls whenever the server control enters edit mode. 通常，通过重写自定义控件中的方法来实现此方法 。Typically you implement this method in a custom control by overriding its method. 在方法中，创建 要与控件关联的自定义控件的实例，将它们添加到 对象，然后返回该对象。In the method, you create instances of the custom controls you want to associate with your controls, add them to an object, and then return that object. 然后，将 控件集合分配给 该区域的属性 。The collection of controls is then assigned to the property of the zone. > [!NOTE] > 在方法的实现中添加到控件集合的任何都 必须为 其 ID 属性分配一个值，否则在将集合分配给属性时会引发异常 。Any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义控件中的方法 。The following code example demonstrates an override of the method in a custom control. 运行示例所需的完整源代码位于类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code required to run the sample is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例包含接口的两个成员 。The code example contains both members of the interface. 请注意，方法的重写 创建一个 来收集一个或多个自定义 控件，然后使用列表来创建 对象。Note that the override of the method creates an to collect one or more custom controls, and then uses the list to create the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 此 方法返回的对象是只读的，并且没有可用于向其中添加单个控件的可访问方法。

span.span: The object that the method returns is read-only and has no accessible method to add individual controls to it.

para.span: 但是，在方法的重写或实现中，可以创建另一种类型的 对象（如 ）来包含所有自定义 控件，并在创建新对象时将其传递到构造函数 。

span.span: However, in your override or implementation of the method, you can create another kind of object, such as an , to contain all the custom controls, and pass it to the constructor when you create a new object.

para.span: 有关代码示例，请参见 "示例" 部分。

span.span: For a code example, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对将由 控件编辑的 控件、用户控件或自定义控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control, user control, or custom control that will be edited by controls.

value.span: 对 控件的关联控件的对象引用。

span.span: An object reference to the control associated with an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法，使 控件能够获取与关联的服务器控件的引用。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the server controls they are associated with. 尽管属性本身是只读的，但它返回的对象引用允许 控件更改服务器控件中的值。Although the property itself is read-only, the object reference that it returns enables controls to change values in the server control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在自定义控件中重写属性 。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be overridden in a custom control. 运行此示例所需的完整源代码位于类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code required to run the example is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例将重写接口的两个成员 。The code example overrides both members of the interface. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 通常，在 服务器控件中实现属性时，只需返回对服务器控件本身的引用。

span.span: Normally, when you implement the property in a server control, you simply return a reference to the server control itself.

para.span: 对于 类，因为它会包装子控件以使其能够作为控件运行，所以， 它的属性实现将 返回对子控件的引用。

span.span: In the case of the class, because it wraps a child control to enable it to function as a control, its implementation of the property returns a reference to the child control.
